help_step.name: tour_0
help_step.text:
GENERAL INFO

Select Tenants Search Form

  • This page provides the facility for the user to assgin the collector to tenants by using search part of the screen.
  • As a result of the search tenants accounts will be listed.

Exexcute assign to collector

  • Select the listed tenants by using check box in the select all column.
  • select the collector from the 'Assign to' dropdown.
  • Click the Assign button to assign the collector

help_step.name: tour_1
help_step.text: Search the tenants using given fields

help_step.name: tour_2
help_step.text: Select the listed tenants which you want to assign to the collector employee

help_step.name: tour_4
help_step.text: Click to assign the collector employee for selected tenants
